title: Crystal
lyrics:
Falling through the crystal glasses
I feel all that bites me
This is spiraling out free
Dream all there are to see
Falling through the crystal glasses

I feel all that bites me

This is spiraling out free

Dream all there are to see



Falling through the crystal glasses

I feel all that bites me

This is spiraling out free

Joy for the home to see



We'll sign for through you

I don't mind, thin catcher

Take from me what I can't find

This desert has gone



Falling through the crystal glasses

I feel all that bites me

This is spiraling out free

Joy for the home to see
